result.title: New cognitive sensing systems validation: Cement & chemical case
result.description: Demonstrators installed and preliminary validated in the cement plant (image analysis for estimation of free lime in cement clinker & soft sensors for particle-size distribution measurement) and in the chemical plant (liquid-solvent interface quality detection & quality of the solvent measurement & acquisition system behaviour).
